title.narrative: Development of a National Statistical System for Tanzania

description.narrative: To develop a national statistical system that effectively and efficiently delivers reliable and timely statistics in accordance with international standards and best practice.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section I.A.2 | Description :Establishment and maintenance of four Sector Statistics Working Groups| Due Date :31-Dec-2011
Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section I.A.5 | Description :Appointment of an independent auditor | Due Date :31-Dec-2011
Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section I.B.2.a | Description :Submission of an Annual Work Plan (AWP), Annual Procurement Plan(APP), training plan and budget | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section I.B.2.c | Description :Evidence of required funding has been allocated to the project |Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section I.B.3.1 | Description :Read-only access to the project accounts granted to the Association| Due Date :09-Sep-2011
Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section I.B.3.2 | Description :The Recipient shall furnish the Association a statement of theproject accounts | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section II.B.1 | Description :The Recipient shall carry out jointly with the Association, amid-term review of the progress made in carrying out the Project, under terms of reference acceptable to the Association. | DueDate :09-Feb-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section II.B.3 | Description :The Recipient shall ensure the commencement of the implementing therecommendations of the Mid-Term Review as agreed with the Association. | Due Date :31-Jul-2014
